mods.abstract: Runaways in Jail. Were committed to Jail in this place, slaves LEONARD, LUKE, and WILLIAM, claiming to belong to Mr. Florentin Michel, from near Houma, Terrebone parish. Leonard is about 5 ft. 10 or 11 in. high; griffe, well built; about 24 years old; wears light beard; does not speak quickly or plainly; will weigh about 170 lbs. Luke is about 5. ft. 10 in.; black; well built; about 26 years old; wears beard; will weigh 165 lbs. William is about 5 feet 7 in.; light griffe; slender built; aged 21 years; will weigh about 135 lbs. The owner is hereby notified to reclaim said slaves as the law directs. THEO. BLANCHARD, Sherif. jan21

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
